title: Facebook to debut ‘News Tab’ product on Friday, company says
text:
Facebook will launch its new human-curated service for promoting news articles at an event Friday, a company spokesperson told POLITICO today.

Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg teased the rollout of the "News Tab" feature at a House Financial Services Committee hearing, his first testimony on Capitol Hill since last year.

Story Continued Below

“Later in this week we actually have a big announcement coming up on launching a big initiative around news and journalism where we’re partnering with a lot of folks to build a new product that’s supporting high-quality journalism,” Zuckerberg said.
